destroy

public void destroy()
资源清理
在不再使用Gif或退出时，务必调用本方法

setListener

public void setListener(GifListener listener,
                        int iType)
设置动画事件回调
gif动画有二个事件会回调：1.播放次数，2当前播放的帧数

参数：
listener -
iType - 见GifListner中的定义

setLoopNumber

public void setLoopNumber(int num)
设置动画播放的次数，必须大于1
本方法优先级大于setLoopAnimation

参数：
num -

setLoopAnimation

public void setLoopAnimation()
设置动画循环播放
默认动画只播放一次

restartGifAnimation

public void restartGifAnimation()
继续显示动画
在暂停动画后，通过本方法来让动画继续

pauseGifAnimation

public void pauseGifAnimation()
暂停动画
在onPause中，最好调用本方法来让动画暂停

getBitmap

public final Bitmap getBitmap()
Returns the bitmap used by this drawable to render. May be null.

setTargetDensity

public void setTargetDensity(Canvas canvas)
Set the density scale at which this drawable will be rendered. This method assumes the drawable will be rendered at the same density as the specified canvas.

参数：
canvas - The Canvas from which the density scale must be obtained.
另请参见：
android.graphics.Bitmap#setDensity(int), android.graphics.Bitmap#getDensity()

setTargetDensity

public void setTargetDensity(DisplayMetrics metrics)
Set the density scale at which this drawable will be rendered.

参数：
metrics - The DisplayMetrics indicating the density scale for this drawable.
另请参见：
android.graphics.Bitmap#setDensity(int), android.graphics.Bitmap#getDensity()

getGravity

public int getGravity()
Get the gravity used to position/stretch the bitmap within its bounds. See android.view.Gravity

返回：
the gravity applied to the bitmap

setGravity

public void setGravity(int gravity)
Set the gravity used to position/stretch the bitmap within its bounds. See android.view.Gravity

参数：
gravity - the gravity

setAntiAlias

public void setAntiAlias(boolean aa)
Enables or disables anti-aliasing for this drawable. Anti-aliasing affects the edges of the bitmap only so it applies only when the drawable is rotated.

参数：
aa - True if the bitmap should be anti-aliased, false otherwise.

setFilterBitmap

public void setFilterBitmap(boolean filter)

setDither

public void setDither(boolean dither)

getTileModeX

public Shader.TileMode getTileModeX()
Indicates the repeat behavior of this drawable on the X axis.

返回：
Shader.TileMode#CLAMP if the bitmap does not repeat, Shader.TileMode#REPEAT or Shader.TileMode#MIRROR otherwise.

getTileModeY

public Shader.TileMode getTileModeY()
Indicates the repeat behavior of this drawable on the Y axis.

返回：
Shader.TileMode#CLAMP if the bitmap does not repeat, Shader.TileMode#REPEAT or Shader.TileMode#MIRROR otherwise.

setTileModeX

public void setTileModeX(Shader.TileMode mode)
Sets the repeat behavior of this drawable on the X axis. By default, the drawable does not repeat its bitmap. Using Shader.TileMode#REPEAT or Shader.TileMode#MIRROR the bitmap can be repeated (or tiled) if the bitmap is smaller than this drawable.

参数：
mode - The repeat mode for this drawable.
另请参见：
#setTileModeY(android.graphics.Shader.TileMode), #setTileModeXY(android.graphics.Shader.TileMode, android.graphics.Shader.TileMode)

setTileModeY

public final void setTileModeY(Shader.TileMode mode)
Sets the repeat behavior of this drawable on the Y axis. By default, the drawable does not repeat its bitmap. Using Shader.TileMode#REPEAT or Shader.TileMode#MIRROR the bitmap can be repeated (or tiled) if the bitmap is smaller than this drawable.

参数：
mode - The repeat mode for this drawable.
另请参见：
#setTileModeX(android.graphics.Shader.TileMode), #setTileModeXY(android.graphics.Shader.TileMode, android.graphics.Shader.TileMode)

setTileModeXY

public void setTileModeXY(Shader.TileMode xmode,
                          Shader.TileMode ymode)
Sets the repeat behavior of this drawable on both axis. By default, the drawable does not repeat its bitmap. Using Shader.TileMode#REPEAT or Shader.TileMode#MIRROR the bitmap can be repeated (or tiled) if the bitmap is smaller than this drawable.

参数：
xmode - The X repeat mode for this drawable.
ymode - The Y repeat mode for this drawable.
另请参见：
#setTileModeX(android.graphics.Shader.TileMode), #setTileModeY(android.graphics.Shader.TileMode)
